author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia: OPCW heading to site of alleged chemical attack in Syria's Douma
text:
MOSCOW, April 21 (Reuters) - The Russian Foreign Ministry said a special commission from the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) left on Saturday morning for the site of the alleged gas attack in the Syrian town of Douma. (Reporting by Maria Kiselyova, Editing by William Maclean)
